channel.title: programming on Shadowsong's Personal Website
channel.description: Recent content in programming on Shadowsong's Personal Website

item.title: DevOps Log 2: Setup Fargate Service without Public IP
item.description: This article will describe the process to setup Fargate tasks with only private IP, using images stored in a private registry.

item.title: DE Log 5: Thoughts on Analytical Tables
item.description: I have taken some Database design course back in university days, though I have skipped almost all of the lectures as I was also self-learning during my first internship on the same matter, in a much more practical manner. I did not even know the word OLAP back then. However, I am not dismissing the importance of data modelling in data engineering. On the contrary, data modelling is one of the important skills if you want to be a data engineer.

item.title: DE Log 4: ETL vs ELT
item.description: We have all heard of the term ETL. If you are working in the data field, you might have been asked to do some sort of ETL work regardless of your actual job description.

item.title: Customize Terminal and IDE
item.description: This short article aims to reproduce my current workbench, using color plattes of my choice.

item.title: DE Log 3: Amazon Redshift disk space saving tips
item.description: Recently Amazon Redshift launched a new console interface, which is pretty nice. It actually gives some valuable optimisation tips. A data warehouse is like a sword, you need to constantly sharpen it so it wonâ€™t lose its edge.

item.title: DE Log 2.1: Develop Data Science Project in Production
item.description: Recently I was working on the deployment of a predictive model built by my dear friend valued ex-colleague. Here I will share some thoughts and challenges I have encountered during its production deployment.

item.title: DE Log 1: Idempotency
item.description: In linear algebra, an idempotent matrix is a matrix which, when multiplied by itself, yields itself.

item.title: DevOps Log 1: Setup DataDog and APM in AWS Fargate
item.description: Recently I am migrating some microservices and streaming pipelines to AWS Fargate. This article mainly covers the issues, pitfalls and other useful notes when I was deploying a web backend with DataDog.

item.title: Build Hugo Blog on Github Pages Master Branch
item.description: This short article aims to address issues I encountered during hosting personal static blog on Github Page.

item.title: DevOps Log 0.1: Setup Cloudwatch on EC2 Instance
item.description: I wrote this initially in our internal documentation website, so this is a very short note on how to setup Cloudwatch on AWS EC2.

item.title: DE Log 0.1: Rescheduling of Airflow DAGs
item.description: This article briefly records the step to reschedule a DAG on Apache Airflow
